name: NPR
text:
The tiniest state is moving toward shortening its official name ‚Äî Rhode Island and Providence Plantations ‚Äî due to connotations of slavery.

The latter phrase will be removed from state documents under an executive order by the governor.
https://t.co/SkGraisso7

name: NPR
text:
An FBI investigation has concluded that NASCAR driver Bubba Wallace was not the target of a hate crime. The noose found in Wallace's stall was a garage door pull rope, NASCAR said.
https://t.co/wnAaE1p7WA

name: NPR
text:
In Ohio, a General Motors plant that shuttered last year is being retooled to build electric pickup trucks. The company says it plans to eventually hire thousands of people back to the plant.
https://t.co/Sf2FVRBAAA

name: NPR
text:
Our summer reader poll is back!

This year, with lots of folks staying inside, we want to hear about your favorite books for young kids ‚Äî specifically picture books and very easy chapter books.

Have thoughts? Submit your vote here ‚§µ
https://t.co/c9sv6swQiT

name: NPR
text:
Tips to start journaling:

‚úè Write whenever, wherever
üíª Medium doesn't matter
üòå Write about anything ‚Äî whatever moves you
‚öô Look to reflect, or see something from a new perspective. Don't expect a solution or quick fix

More from @NPRLifeKit:
https://t.co/iGLB8wK2nB

name: NPR
text:
"There's nobody I trust more to be able to heal this country and get back on track than my dear friend Joe Biden," Former President Barack Obama told supporters during a virtual Biden fundraiser Tuesday.
https://t.co/CR7caHXhWH

name: NPR
text:
The Trump administration is adding 2 new political appointees to the U.S. Census Bureau, raising concerns among some Democrats about partisan interference with the ongoing national head count.
https://t.co/IyjeWFtvZ2

name: NPR
text:
An LGBTQ pride banner was temporarily taken down from the U.S. Embassy in Jerusalem on Tuesday. The city's deputy mayor asked for its removal after residents claimed it was offensive.
https://t.co/I5ae17MQJS

name: NPR
text:
"I often tell my young patients, HPV ‚Äì the human papillomavirus virus ‚Äì was asymptomatic. Yet 10, 20 years down the line, we're seeing cervical cancer, we're seeing penile cancers," says Florida Dr. Cheryl Holder.
https://t.co/03150zITdZ

name: NPR
text:
The CEO of Macmillan ‚Äî one of the Big Five book publishing houses ‚Äî is stepping back from day-to-day responsibilities, following an industry-wide day of action protest against racism organized by five Macmillan employees.
https://t.co/qkBQ0ErblR
